title: Squares of Even Numbers
instructions: Write a Python function that receives a list of integers and returns a list with the squares of the even numbers, with no duplicates, sorted in ascending order.
You MUST write your solution as valid Python code inside the 'solution_code' string field.

Function signature to implement: squares_of_evens(nums: list[int]) -> list[int]
You may add a short demo (print) inside the same string, but keep the function definition clear.
Complexity hint: aim for O(n log n) or better.
constraints: Input list length can be up to 10^5.
Values can be negative or positive.
Return type must be a Python list of integers.
